law.text:
The Administration shall:
supervise the administration of the Program under this part by the local departments;
adopt regulations necessary or desirable to carry out this part, including regulations to:
establish eligibility requirements and any other requirements not set forth in this part; and
establish standards for the amount of assistance a recipient may receive under this part;
prescribe the form of and supply to the local departments any forms the Administration considers necessary and desirable; and
take any other action necessary or desirable to carry out this part.
